lore: Seven creatures emerged from the steam that came out of the Nether Orbs before they were consumed. For a few moments, Spielrein and Baker admired the solemn creatures, completely satisfied with their work.\n\nThe Temperantias Sanctus punishes those who consume more food than necessary by releasing a blue powder that is irresistible to gluttons. The more they eat, the greater their appetite becomes, creating a never-ending spiral that ends in their deaths.
menagerieDialog: (You've always found these sort of creatures unnerving.)
(It seems vengeful. The next few battles should be quite interesting.)
(It seems to be excessively confident in itself. Always a good trait to have in a creature.)
(This creature would make an excellent mascot for {CASTLENAME}.)
(It seems to be gripping the objects in its claws a bit tighter than usual. It must feel anxious about something.)
name: Temperantias Sanctus
